methods.comment:
* Create a client for the {@link RemoteLockscreenValidationService} specified by the
     * {@link ComponentName}
     * @param context Context.
     * @param bgExecutor A background {@link Executor} for service registration.
     * @hide

methods.name: boolean isServiceAvailable()
methods.comment:
* Returns whether the {@link RemoteLockscreenValidationService} defined by the * {@code ComponentName} provided in the constructor is available. * *

Calling API methods like {@link #validateLockscreenGuess} will fail if unavailable.

methods.name: void validateLockscreenGuess(byte[] guess, IRemoteLockscreenValidationCallback callback)
methods.comment:
* Validates the lockscreen guess.
     *
     * @param guess lockscreen guess
     * @param callback object used to relay the response of the guess validation
